response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a commodity; it represents a significant investment and a milestone achievement in my endeavors. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1,200,000. Given its rarity and the effort put into its creation, I believe this offer presents an excellent value proposition for you.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require more information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide you with all the details you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
